reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and clear explanations. Challenging but fair exams.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant instructor. Makes complex topics accessible and fun.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but sometimes disorganized. Office hours were helpful.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Thorough explanations, though pace can be fast. Great problem sets.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Fantastic lab instructor. Patient and encouraging with all students.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Dry lectures, heavy on memorization. Not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions. Assignments encourage critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Brilliant mind, but struggles to explain concepts clearly sometimes.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Inspires students to dive deeper into texts.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Real-world examples make concepts easy to grasp. Fair grader.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Engaging field trips and practical projects. Very knowledgeable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Interesting topics, but can be abstract. Classroom discussions are good.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Wang makes it manageable. Great labs.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Seems biased in lectures. Grading criteria not always clear.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Passionate and knowledgeable. Museum visits were highlights.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Solid explanations, but pacing is sometimes too quick.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating subject matter. Dr. Miller is approachable and helpful.

reviews.subject: Business Ethics
reviews.review: Thought-provoking case studies. Encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of complex topics. Helpful office hours.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but assignments can be unclear. Engaging class discussions.
